text: Madhavsinh Singh Solanki (30 July 1927 â€“ 9 January 2021) was an Indian politician. He was leader of Indian National Congress party. He was External Affairs minister of India from 1991 to 1992. He also was the Chief Minister of Gujarat three times from 1976 to 1977, 1980 to 1985 and from 1989 to 1990. Solanki died on 9 January 2021, aged 93.Former Gujarat CM Madhavsinh Solanki dies at 94 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Gujarat
title: Madhav Singh Solanki
